p: The different ratios used for the fumigation of kernel were: CEO (0.6%, v/ v), CS1 (CEO 10% + SEO 2%), CS2 (CEO 1% + SEO 0.2%), and CS3 (0.5% + SEO 0.1%). CS1, CS2, and CS3 were achieved by mixing EOs in volume ratios ( v/ v). After 7 and 14 days, respectively, the colonization of fumigated wheat grains was evaluated by placing 10 wheat kernels from each ratio on CYGA medium in Petri dishes incubated on day/night regime at 22 + 2 °C. After 4 days, the index colonization value of wheat kernels (ICK) was determined for each treatment [ 48]: ICK (%) = (NCK/NTK) × 100 (3) where NCK is the number of contaminated kernels with one fungus species/treatment and NTK is the number of total kernels used on treatment.
